IMPORTANT:
Only ENGLISH
This is a website for people who know of a property for sale and wish to notify us via our form.
Never comment anything.

1 - Use Next.js with TypeScript by default
2 - Follow best practices
3 - Refactor code whenever possible
4 - Use Tailwind CSS primarily; if not possible, use Styled Components
5 - Always use the variable mint-600 as the main color

- My colors for light and dark mode:

/* Light */
--color-light-100: #f8f8f8;
--color-light-200: #ececec;
--color-light-300: #d9d9d9;
--color-mint-600: #22223b;
--color-secondary: #ff9800;
/* Dark */
--color-dark-300: #181820;
--color-dark-200: #23232b;
--color-dark-100: #2e2e36;
--color-mint-600: #22223b;
--color-secondary: #ff9800;

Additional options:
6 - Ensure accessibility (a11y) in all components
7 - Write clear documentation and comments for complex logic
8 - Optimize images and assets for performance
9 - When refactoring, create new folders and files if necessary to keep the filesystem organized
